attributes.action: Improve the level of  help and support for homeless young people and make access to such help and support easier to understand.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Young people are finding themselves on the streets because the hostels set up to help them are too difficult to apply for, hostels are actually turning away young people who have even the slightest need for support and are  not providing the support that young people need to be able to support themselves upon moving out of hostels so many are ending up back on the streets again. Young people age just 18 are being treated the same as adults and recieving little support despite supposedly being classed as young people by the government.
